title: How to Make Lemon Crinkle Cookies

steps.headline: Combine flour, baking powder and salt in a bowl.
Using your standing mixer, mix together the butter, sugar and lemon zest until it is pale and fluffy
Crack 2 eggs inside the mix while running.
steps.description: When the eggs are blended in, add lemon extract, vanilla extract and mix until combined.

steps.headline: Slowly add the flour, baking powder and salt that was mixed in a different bowl into the standing mixer until combined.
Cover the dough with saran wrap and chill dough in refrigerator for about 30 minutes.
Line 2 baking sheets with the parchment (wax) paper.
Pour powdered sugar in a small bowl.
Using a cookie scooper, scoop about 1 ½ tablespoon.
steps.description: Shape the dough into a ball, drop it and roll around in the powdered sugar. Repeat with the remaining dough and space out each about 2 inches apart on the baking sheet (pan).

steps.headline: Bake in oven for about 10-13 minutes.
steps.description: Cool on drying rack and serve on a plate.

text: Combine flour, baking powder and salt in a bowl. Set aside. Using your standing mixer, mix together the butter, sugar and lemon zest until it is pale and fluffy  Crack 2 eggs inside the mix while running. When the eggs are blended in, add lemon extract, vanilla extract and mix until combined. Slowly add the flour, baking powder and salt that was mixed in a different bowl into the standing mixer until combined.  Cover the dough with saran wrap and chill dough in refrigerator for about 30 minutes.  Preheat oven at 350 degrees.  Line 2 baking sheets with the parchment (wax) paper.  Pour powdered sugar in a small bowl.  Using a cookie scooper, scoop about 1 ½ tablespoon. Shape the dough into a ball, drop it and roll around in the powdered sugar. Repeat with the remaining dough and space out each about 2 inches apart on the baking sheet (pan). Bake in oven for about 10-13 minutes. Cool on drying rack and serve on a plate. Enjoy!
